titles.title: Readying Our Troops for Combat Act of 2014
ROTC Act of 2014
To prohibit certain closures of Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps programs of the Army.
ROTC Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Readying Our Troops for Combat Act of 2014 or the ROTC Act of 2014 - Prohibits the Secretary of the Army from disestablishing, or initiating the disestablishment of, a Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps program of the Army pursuant to specified administrative instructions of the Department of Defense (DOD) until July 1, 2020.
